security: The document is marked 'FOR OFFICIAL USE ONLY,' indicating sensitive internal information. Releasing employment details and discrepancies in Robert Scheer's personal history could be misused. Specifically, the document notes 'Note that on his Statement of Personal History, SUBJECT lists employment at this source for the summer of 1956 when it was in 1955.'
summary: This document is an agent report detailing findings related to Robert Scheer, including his employment history at Laufer's River View Lodge in 1955, as well as discrepancies found between the Lodge's employment records and Scheer's Statement of Personal History.
summary_one_paragraph: This INSCOM/CSF agent report, dated August 26, 1958, details findings on Robert Scheer, focusing on his employment history before induction. Agent Clement J. Pacyna reports that Morris Laufer, co-owner of Laufer's River View Lodge in Loch Sheldrake, New York, provided payroll information indicating Scheer worked as a busboy from July to September 1955. The report notes discrepancies between this record and Scheer's Statement of Personal History, specifically concerning the year of employment and the name of the establishment. No further pertinent information was available at the source.
title: Report of Findings Regarding Robert Scheer's Employment
